title: Login not working
body: I log in and now i am sat on the logging in for about 10 mins and isn't doing anything whats going on rito!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

replies.body:
Just saw confirmation from Spark via their twitter feed, that they were having issues with gaming sites and have fixed it on their end. They were instructing people to restart their modems at this point.

If you are still seeing login issues as you read this, and are using Spark. Please restart your modem, if that doesn't work, I would urge you to reach out to their support line for a fix.

pls spark, pls fix this real quick
































































































































pls{{champion:32}} {{champion:43}} dis are my faces right now
i am more like {{champion:107}} {{champion:63}} {{champion:41}}

Hello everyone, I'm sorry for the late reply here but we are investigating this on our end. I don't have much info to share at this time, but it does seem to be a majority of you with Spark. I will update as soon as I have more info to share.

Same for me in Hamilton
- With Spark (VDSL connection), indefinite loading
- Using Vodafone (Mobile Data Connection), it works
Tried 2 different Modems, Same result
Different Devices, Same result


Last known time of working (Last time online) : 10:20pm 17-7-15 (+12hr Time Zone)
Current Time (Not working) : 2:50pm 18-7-15

Gigabyte Z68AP-D3
I7-2600

3Gb EVGA GTX 780Ti SC
Windows 8.1
120Gb Samsung 840 Evo
1Tb Seagate Barracuda 7200RPM SATA3


* Also side note : Cant log into socialclub either for GTA Online (Thx Spark 4 stopping me playing games)

EDIT : Appears to be fixed as of 3.08

Can you all login now? We haven't seen anything widespread on our end, and seems to be related to Spark players.

Just finished live chat with Spark online-

> [15:03] Kim: Hi there, we do not have any confirmed issues but we are getting a number of reports from customers that something's going on. Our technical team is currently looking into it. I can get someone from our broadband team to give you a call if you would like?

At least they know about it anyway. If anyone wants to join me on the NA server add me in-game _Second Identity_
